pr_title: Fix NPE with MqttUnsubAckMessage - regression of MQTT5 support

timeline.message:
Motivation:

Recent changes for MQTT5 may cause NPE if UNSUBACK message is created with `MqttMessageFactory`
and client code isn't up-to-date.

Modifications:

Added default body in `MqttUnsubAckMessage` constructor if null body is passed,
added null checks in `encodeUnsubAckMessage`

Result:

`MqttUnsubAckMessage` created with `MqttMessageFactory` doesn't cause NPE
even if null body is supplied.

Motivation:

Recent changes for MQTT5 may cause `ClassCastException` in `MqttMessageFactory`
for legacy SUBSCRIBE and UNSUBSCRIBE message

Modifications:

Changed casts for variable header in `MqttMessageFactory`,
adapted message constructors accordingly.

Result:

Both legacy and new headers handled successfully.

timeline.bodyText: nit: consider storing payload() in a local var and use it. There are multiple calls to message.payload()
timeline.author: normanmaurer
normanmaurer

timeline.message: Store UNSUBACK payload in a local variable when encoding.
